name: BOSCAGE
description:
It's set in a greenhouse, there is infectious object living there. If they catch you.. You'll just fuse. ;P 

It will not have any music, please put some on if you want.  Also sorry if it's bad, it's my first attempt at really a game. ^^

-There is only 2 endings so far, both are fusions.-

I'm a dum dum. 

Made with Ren'py. :D
